actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO payments
(created_time,
created_by,
deleted,
updated_time,
updated_by,
amount_paid,
taxable_amt,
gst_amt,
payment_start_date,
payment_end_date,
payment_type,
transaction_id,
transaction_date,
payment_source,
payment_status,
payment_clear_date,
retailer_code,
payment_mode,
payment_clearance_status,
payment_ticket_status,
offer_id,
accounts_remarks,
image_url)
values(
{{create_date_val.formattedDate}},
	{{appsmith.user.email}},
	false,
	now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval,
	{{appsmith.user.email}},
  {{amount_paid_val.text}},
  {{amount_paid_val.text}}/1.18,
  {{amount_paid_val.text}}-{{amount_paid_val.text}}/1.18,
	{{payment_start_date.formattedDate}},
	{{payment_end_date.formattedDate}},
	{{payment_type_val.selectedOptionValue}},
	{{transaction_id_valye.text}},
	{{transaction_date_valye.formattedDate}},
	{{payment_source_val.selectedOptionValue}},
	{{payment_status.selectedOptionValue}},
	{{payment_clear_date.formattedDate}},
	{{create_retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}},
	{{payment_mode_val.selectedOptionValue}},
	{{payment_clearance_status.isChecked}},
	'APPROVED',
  {{offer_code.selectedOptionValue?offer_code.selectedOptionValue:null}},
	{{payment_remarks.text}},	      {{'https://d38k006j01s1t8.cloudfront.net/APPSMITH'+payment_ticket_upload.data.signedUrl.split("?")[0].split("APPSMITH")[1]}}
)
